title: Asian Stocks Set for Muted Open in Holiday Trade: Markets Wrap
description: Asian stocks are set for a muted open with several regional markets still shut for holidays. Sentiment may remain generally positive after US shares extended this year’s gain on Wednesday.
content: Asian stocks are set for a muted open with several regional markets still shut for holidays. Sentiment may remain generally positive after US shares extended this year’s gain on Wednesday.
